title: 2024 Life Time Grand Prix: Application window, event details, and what’s new for next year
content:
The application period for the third edition of the off-road opens Friday, October 13 at 4:00 pm CDT.

Read the full article at 2024 Life Time Grand Prix: Application window, event details, and what’s new for next year on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
